Name: Cafe Bambino
column10: 1. Duplicate this sheet and rename it with your name

Name: Fresh Flours
column10: 3. If you don't have an opinion on a coffee shop, you can leave it blank

Name: The Station
column10: 2. Rate each coffee shop along each dimension with a number from 1-5

Name: Analog Coffee
Notes: Love the vibe, but not a lot of work space

Name: Bakery Nouveau
Notes: Amazing food, obviously. Coffee is nothing special.

Name: Caffe Vita
Notes: This has a special place in my heart. Staff can come off a bit snobby.

Name: Good Weather Bicycle & Cafe
Notes: Guy who runs this place is really nice

Name: Joe Bar
Notes: Tables are small; not a great place to work

Name: Starbucks Reserve
Notes: Underrated

Name: Victrola (15th)
Notes: Lots of tables, lots of outlets

Name: Vivace
Notes: No wifi on weekends

Name: Vivace Sidewalk Stop
Notes: Great place to grab a quick espresso if you're out and about

Name: Alexandra's
Notes: Their pop tart style pastries are amazing

Name: Broadcast (either)
Notes: Great vibe, great friendly staff

Name: Squirrel Chops
Notes: Paninis are good

Name: Union Coffee
Notes: Some say the vibe here is weird. Feels like an art gallery. I personally love it.

Name: Columbia City Bakery
Notes: Really really good pastries, bread, etc

Name: Storyville
Notes: Coffee is great, vibe is weird. Basically a nicer starbucks

Name: Starbucks (normal)
Notes: Starbucks food is legit

Name: Cafe Ladro
Notes: Logo is bad

Name: Tougo
Notes: Cool spot, apparently the owner fired the old staff though

Name: Milstead
Notes: Too friendly

Name: Hood Famous
Notes: Can't recommend this place enough. No place to work, but amazing coffee and treats. There often is a line.

Name: Tous les Jour
Notes: Definitely part of a chain and it feels like it, but some good treats.

Name: QED Coffee
Notes: Cool math style

Name: Solstice
Notes: A classic
